page.title: 13Herrison Hospital
page.content: The Mental Illness Unit for West and East Dorset is based at Herrison Hospital. This is the largest hospital within the West Dorset Health Authority. The hospital is situated in a rural area with extensive gardens. Within the Herrison complex, the West Dorset Health Authority's AdministrativeOffices are based, and the4 District Finance offices at Summerhill. There is also a laundry which serves most of the hospitals within West Dorset. The hospital has an average of 430 occupied be4ds and catering for the acutely ill, the elderly and the long stay patients.The Mental Illness Unit has established a Community Nursing and Ocupational Therapy Service which it is continuing to develop.
